```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(raster)
library(here)
library(stringr)
```

## check the quality of the ECOSTRESS LST images
```{r}
files <- list.files(path = here("data", "ECOSTRESS", "int", "celcius"), full.names = TRUE)

pal <- colorRampPalette(c("darkblue", "blue", "steelblue1", "white", "yellow", "orange", "red"))

plot_with_name <- function(raster){
  print(plot(raster, 
             col = pal(50), 
             main=names(raster), 
             zlim=c(0, 60)))
}

plot_batch <- function(batch){
  files <- files[(1:10+(batch*10))]
  rasters <- lapply(files, raster)
  print(lapply(rasters, plot_with_name))
}
```

```{r}
plot_batch(0)
```
